pageContext.seoTitle: Vehicle inspections in Sydney and NSW | Motorserve
pageContext.seoDescription: Get detailed, same-day reports with your Motorserve pre-purchase vehicle inspection so you can buy a used car with confidence. Book now!

children.text: Buy a used car with confidence

Even if you’re pretty good with cars, it can be hard to know what you're getting when buying a used vehicle. A car that looks pretty good on the outside may turn out, in fact to be a lemon. That’s why Motorserve offers
for buyers looking to purchase a used vehicle - to take the guesswork out of the equation and to give you, the buyer, greater reassurance that you've got what you need to make an informed decision.
Our expert mechanics perform thorough visual inspections and checks and you'll get
on the condition of the vehicle. With Motorserve, you'll get

Don't just take the seller's word for it. Arm yourself with important knowledge about the key aspects of the used vehicle, to help you make an informed decision on the purchase. Having your vehicle inspected by an expert Motorserve mechanic can help give you peace of mind,
before you buy it. Vehicle inspections are conducted in most of our Motorserve car servicing stores*.
Inspection reports from Motorserve include an
that tells you what you need to know about your second-hand car, including any repairs that may be needed,
you finalise your purchase. Our mechanics assess extensive aspects of the vehicle including the exterior, the engine, the tyres and brakes, as well as the underbody and more.
on our vehicle inspections which start from $259, and better still, if you're an NRMA Member you'll save 10% off your vehicle inspection^.

available at Motorserve Artarmon, Campbelltown, Liverpool, Narrabeen, Padstow, South Strathfield, Rouse Hill and Wollongong stores.

bannerMessage.title: How we’re continuing to serve the community

children.text: It’s our mission to do everything we can to keep you and your loved ones safe on the road and in the community. That’s why we’ve implemented a number of changes across all Motorserve stores to help minimise the spread of the COVID-19 virus.

pageContext.title: Vehicle Inspections

cards.title: Roadworthy inspections (NSW & ACT)
cards.description: We can provide NSW Pinkslips and ACT Roadworthy Inspections.

image.alt: motorserve mechanic in workshop next to silver car

cards.title: Logbook service
cards.description: Motorserve is an authorised logbook service provider. We conduct logbook services to to manufacturers specifications so your vehicle warranty is maintained.

image.alt: motorserve mechanic inspecting car in workshop

cards.title: Air conditioning and re-gas
cards.description: Motorserve can help keep you cool in summer and warm in winter.
